00170 // Loop through and create a few soldier squad ID's for vehicles ( max # 3 )
00171 void InitVehicles( )
00172 {
00173       INT32       cnt;
00174       GROUP       *pGroup     =     NULL;
00175 
00176       for( cnt = 0; cnt <  MAX_VEHICLES; cnt++ )
00177       {
00178             // create mvt groups
00179             gubVehicleMovementGroups[ cnt ] = CreateNewVehicleGroupDepartingFromSector( 1, 1, cnt );
00180 
00181             // Set persistent....
00182             pGroup = GetGroup( gubVehicleMovementGroups[ cnt ] );
00183             pGroup->fPersistant = TRUE;
00184       }
00185 }

00193 
00194   // Init fuel!
00195   pVehicle->sBreathRed = 10000;
00196   pVehicle->bBreath    = 100;
00197 
00198   pVehicle->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI = MERC_TYPE__VEHICLE;
00199 }

00201 INT32 AddVehicleToList( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubType )
00202 {
00203       // insert this vehicle into the list
00204       // how many vehicles are there?
00205       INT32 iVehicleIdValue = -1;
00206       INT32 iCounter = 0, iCount = 0;
00207       VEHICLETYPE *pTempList = NULL;
00208       BOOLEAN fFoundEmpty = FALSE;
00209       GROUP *pGroup;
00210 
00211 
00212       if( pVehicleList != NULL )
00213       {
00214             // not the first, add to list
00215             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < ubNumberOfVehicles ; iCounter++ )
00216             {
00217                   // might have an empty slot
00218                   if( pVehicleList[ iCounter ].fValid == FALSE )
00219                   {
00220                         iCount = iCounter;
00221                         iCounter = ubNumberOfVehicles;
00222                         fFoundEmpty = TRUE;
00223                     iVehicleIdValue = iCount;
00224                   }
00225             }
00226       }
00227 
00228       if( fFoundEmpty == FALSE )
00229       {
00230             iCount = ubNumberOfVehicles;
00231       }
00232 
00233       if( iCount == 0 )
00234       {
00235             pVehicleList = (VEHICLETYPE *) MemAlloc( sizeof( VEHICLETYPE ) );
00236 
00237             // Set!
00238             memset( pVehicleList, 0, sizeof( VEHICLETYPE ) );
00239 
00240             ubNumberOfVehicles = 1;
00241             iVehicleIdValue          = 0;
00242       }
00243       
00244 
00245       if( ( iVehicleIdValue == -1 ) && ( iCount != 0 ) && ( fFoundEmpty == FALSE ) )
00246       {
00247 
00248             // no empty slot found, need to realloc
00249             pTempList = (VEHICLETYPE *) MemAlloc( sizeof( VEHICLETYPE ) * ubNumberOfVehicles );
00250 
00251             // copy to temp
00252             memcpy( pTempList, pVehicleList, sizeof( VEHICLETYPE ) * ubNumberOfVehicles );
00253 
00254             // now realloc
00255             pVehicleList = (VEHICLETYPE *) MemRealloc( pVehicleList, ( sizeof( VEHICLETYPE ) * ( ubNumberOfVehicles + 1 ) ) );
00256 
00257             // memset the stuff
00258             memset( pVehicleList, 0, ( sizeof( VEHICLETYPE ) * ( ubNumberOfVehicles + 1 ) ) );
00259 
00260             // now copy the stuff back
00261             memcpy( pVehicleList, pTempList, sizeof( VEHICLETYPE ) * ( ubNumberOfVehicles ) );
00262 
00263             // now get rid of crap
00264             MemFree( pTempList );
00265 
00266             // now get the index value
00267             iVehicleIdValue = ubNumberOfVehicles;
00268 
00269             ubNumberOfVehicles++;
00270 
00271 
00272       }
00273 
00274       // found a slot
00275       pVehicleList[ iCount ].ubMovementGroup = 0;
00276       pVehicleList[ iCount ].sSectorX = sMapX;
00277       pVehicleList[ iCount ].sSectorY = sMapY;
00278       pVehicleList[ iCount ].sSectorZ = 0;
00279       pVehicleList[ iCount ].sGridNo = sGridNo;
00280       memset( pVehicleList[ iCount ].pPassengers, 0, 10 * sizeof( SOLDIERTYPE * ) );
00281       pVehicleList[ iCount ].fValid = TRUE;
00282       pVehicleList[ iCount ].ubVehicleType = ubType;
00283       pVehicleList[ iCount ].pMercPath = NULL;
00284       pVehicleList[ iCount ].fFunctional = TRUE;
00285       pVehicleList[ iCount ].fDestroyed = FALSE;
00286       pVehicleList[ iCount ].iMoveSound                 = iMoveVehicleSndID[ ubType ];
00287       pVehicleList[ iCount ].iOutOfSound              = iEnterVehicleSndID[ ubType ];
00288       pVehicleList[ iCount ].ubProfileID              = ubVehicleTypeProfileID[ ubType ];
00289       pVehicleList[ iCount ].ubMovementGroup  = gubVehicleMovementGroups[ iCount ];
00290 
00291       // ATE: Add movement mask to group...
00292       pGroup = GetGroup( pVehicleList[ iCount ].ubMovementGroup );
00293 
00294       if( !pGroup )
00295       {
00296             if( gfEditMode )
00297             {
00298                   //This is okay, no groups exist, so simply return.
00299                   return iVehicleIdValue;
00300             }
00301             Assert( 0 );
00302       }
00303 
00304       pGroup->ubTransportationMask = (UINT8)iMvtTypes[ ubType ];
00305 
00306       // ARM: setup group movement defaults
00307       pGroup->ubSectorX = ( UINT8 ) sMapX;
00308       pGroup->ubNextX   = ( UINT8 ) sMapX;
00309       pGroup->ubSectorY = ( UINT8 ) sMapY;
00310       pGroup->ubNextY   = ( UINT8 ) sMapY;
00311       pGroup->uiTraverseTime = 0;
00312       pGroup->uiArrivalTime  = 0;
00313 
00314       SetUpArmorForVehicle( ( UINT8 )iCount );
00315 
00316       return( iVehicleIdValue );
00317 }

00320 BOOLEAN RemoveVehicleFromList( INT32 iId )
00321 {
00322       // remove this vehicle from the list
00323 
00324       // error check
00325       if( ( iId >= ubNumberOfVehicles ) || ( iId < 0 ) )
00326       {
00327             return ( FALSE );
00328       }
00329       
00330       // clear remaining path nodes
00331       if( pVehicleList[ iId ].pMercPath != NULL )
00332       {
00333             pVehicleList[ iId ].pMercPath = ClearStrategicPathList( pVehicleList[ iId ].pMercPath, 0 );
00334       }
00335 
00336       // zero out mem
00337       memset( &( pVehicleList[ iId ] ), 0, sizeof( VEHICLETYPE ) );
00338 
00339       return( TRUE );
00340 }
00341 
00342 void ClearOutVehicleList( void )
00343 {
00344       INT32 iCounter;
00345 
00346       // empty out the vehicle list
00347       if( pVehicleList )
00348       {
00349             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < ubNumberOfVehicles ; iCounter++ )
00350             {
00351                   // if there is a valid vehicle
00352                   if( pVehicleList[ iCounter ].fValid )
00353                   {
00354                         //if the vehicle has a valid path
00355                         if( pVehicleList[ iCounter ].pMercPath )
00356                         {
00357                               //toast the vehicle path
00358                               pVehicleList[ iCounter ].pMercPath = ClearStrategicPathList( pVehicleList[ iCounter ].pMercPath, 0 );
00359                         }
00360                   }
00361             }
00362 
00363             MemFree( pVehicleList );
00364             pVehicleList = NULL;
00365             ubNumberOfVehicles = 0;
00366       }
00367 
00368 /*    
00369       // empty out the vehicle list
00370       if( pVehicleList )
00371       {
00372             MemFree( pVehicleList );
00373             pVehicleList = NULL;
00374             ubNumberOfVehicles = 0;
00375       }
00376 */
00377 }

00379 BOOLEAN IsThisVehicleAccessibleToSoldier( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT32 iId )
00380 {
00381       if( pSoldier == NULL )
00382       {
00383             return( FALSE );
00384       }
00385 
00386       if( ( iId >= ubNumberOfVehicles ) || ( iId < 0 ) )
00387       {
00388             return ( FALSE );
00389       }
00390 
00391       // now check if vehicle is valid
00392       if( pVehicleList[ iId ].fValid == FALSE )
00393       {
00394             return( FALSE );
00395       }
00396 
00397       // if the soldier or the vehicle is between sectors
00398       if( pSoldier->fBetweenSectors || pVehicleList[ iId ].fBetweenSectors )
00399       {
00400             return( FALSE );
00401       }
00402 
00403       // any sector values off?
00404       if( ( pSoldier->sSectorX != pVehicleList[ iId ].sSectorX ) ||
00405                   ( pSoldier->sSectorY != pVehicleList[ iId ].sSectorY ) ||
00406                   ( pSoldier->bSectorZ != pVehicleList[ iId ].sSectorZ ) )
00407       {
00408             return( FALSE );
00409       }
00410 
00411       // if vehicle is not ok to use then return false
00412       if ( !OKUseVehicle( pVehicleList[ iId ].ubProfileID ) )
00413       {
00414             return( FALSE );
00415       }
00416 
00417       return( TRUE );
00418 }

00420  
00421 BOOLEAN AddSoldierToVehicle( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT32 iId )
00422 {
00423       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00424       SOLDIERTYPE *pVehicleSoldier = NULL;
00425 
00426 
00427       // Add Soldierto Vehicle
00428       if( ( iId >= ubNumberOfVehicles ) || ( iId < 0 ) )
00429       {
00430             return ( FALSE );
00431       }
00432 
00433       // ok now check if any free slots in the vehicle
00434 
00435       // now check if vehicle is valid
00436       if( pVehicleList[ iId ].fValid == FALSE )
00437       {
00438             return( FALSE );
00439       }
00440  
00441       // get the vehicle soldiertype
00442       pVehicleSoldier = GetSoldierStructureForVehicle( iId );
00443       
00444       if( pVehicleSoldier )
00445       {
00446             if ( pVehicleSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
00447             {
00448                   // Change sides...
00449                   pVehicleSoldier = ChangeSoldierTeam( pVehicleSoldier, gbPlayerNum );
00450                   // add it to mapscreen list                     
00451                   fReBuildCharacterList = TRUE;
00452             }
00453       }
00454 
00455       // If vehicle is empty, add to unique squad now that it has somebody in it!
00456       if ( GetNumberInVehicle( iId ) == 0 && pVehicleSoldier )
00457       {
00458             // 2 ) Add to unique squad...
00459             AddCharacterToUniqueSquad( pVehicleSoldier );
00460 
00461             // ATE: OK funcky stuff here!
00462             // We have now a guy on a squad group, remove him!
00463             RemovePlayerFromGroup( SquadMovementGroups[ pVehicleSoldier->bAssignment ], pVehicleSoldier  );
00464 
00465     // I really have vehicles.\
00466     // ONLY add to vehicle group once!
00467     if ( !DoesPlayerExistInPGroup( pVehicleList[ iId ].ubMovementGroup, pVehicleSoldier ) )
00468     {
00469               //NOW.. add guy to vehicle group....
00470               AddPlayerToGroup( pVehicleList[ iId ].ubMovementGroup, pVehicleSoldier  );
00471     }       
00472     else
00473     {
00474       pVehicleSoldier->ubGroupID = pVehicleList[ iId ].ubMovementGroup;
00475     }
00476       }
00477 
00478       // check if the grunt is already here
00479       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iSeatingCapacities[ pVehicleList[ iId ].ubVehicleType ]; iCounter++ )
00480       {
00481             if( pVehicleList[ iId ].pPassengers[ iCounter ] == pSoldier )
00482             {
00483                   // guy found, no need to add
00484                   return( TRUE );
00485             }
00486       }
00487 
00488       if ( pVehicleSoldier )
00489       {
00490             // can't call SelectSoldier in mapscreen, that will initialize interface panels!!!
00491         if ( guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
00492             {
00493                   SelectSoldier( pVehicleSoldier->ubID, FALSE, TRUE );
00494             }
00495 
00496             PlayJA2Sample( pVehicleList[ pVehicleSoldier->bVehicleID ].iOutOfSound, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( HIGHVOLUME, pVehicleSoldier->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pVehicleSoldier->sGridNo ) );             
00497       }
00498 
00499       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iSeatingCapacities[ pVehicleList[ iId ].ubVehicleType ]; iCounter++ )
00500       {
00501             // check if slot free
00502             if( pVehicleList[ iId ].pPassengers[ iCounter ] == NULL )
00503             {
00504                   // add person in
00505                   pVehicleList[ iId ].pPassengers[ iCounter ] = pSoldier;
00506 
00507                   if( pSoldier->bAssignment == VEHICLE )
00508                   {
00509                         TakeSoldierOutOfVehicle( pSoldier );
00510                         // NOTE: This will leave the soldier on a squad.  Must be done PRIOR TO and in AS WELL AS the call
00511                         // to RemoveCharacterFromSquads() that's coming up, to permit direct vehicle->vehicle reassignment!
00512                   }
00513 
00514                   // if in a squad, remove from squad, if not, check if in vehicle, if so remove, if not, then check if in mvt group..if so, move and destroy group
00515                   if( pSoldier->bAssignment < ON_DUTY )
00516                   {
00517                         RemoveCharacterFromSquads( pSoldier );
00518                   }
00519                   else if( pSoldier->ubGroupID != 0 )
00520                   {
00521                         // destroy group and set to zero
00522                         RemoveGroup( pSoldier->ubGroupID );
00523                         pSoldier->ubGroupID = 0;
00524                   }
00525 
00526                   if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment != VEHICLE ) || (   pSoldier -> iVehicleId != iId ) )
00527                   {
00528                         SetTimeOfAssignmentChangeForMerc( pSoldier );
00529                   }
00530 
00531                   // set thier assignment
00532                   ChangeSoldiersAssignment( pSoldier, VEHICLE );
00533 
00534                   // set vehicle id
00535                   pSoldier -> iVehicleId = iId;
00536 
00537                   // if vehicle is part of mvt group, then add character to mvt group
00538                   if( pVehicleList[ iId ].ubMovementGroup != 0 )
00539                   {
00540                         // add character
00541                         AddPlayerToGroup( pVehicleList[ iId ].ubMovementGroup, pSoldier );
00542 
00543                   }
00544 
00545                   // Are we the first?
00546                   if ( GetNumberInVehicle(  iId ) == 1 )
00547                   {
00548                         // Set as driver...
00549                         pSoldier->uiStatusFlags |= SOLDIER_DRIVER;
00550 
00551                         SetDriver( iId , pSoldier->ubID );
00552 
00553                   }
00554                   else
00555                   {
00556                         // Set as driver...
00557                         pSoldier->uiStatusFlags |= SOLDIER_PASSENGER;
00558                   }
00559 
00560                   // Remove soldier's graphic
00561                   RemoveSoldierFromGridNo( pSoldier );
00562 
00563                   if ( pVehicleSoldier )
00564                   {
00565                         // Set gridno for vehicle.....
00566                         EVENT_SetSoldierPosition( pSoldier, pVehicleSoldier->dXPos, pVehicleSoldier->dYPos );
00567 
00568                         // Stop from any movement.....
00569                         EVENT_StopMerc( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection );
00570 
00571                         // can't call SetCurrentSquad OR SelectSoldier in mapscreen, that will initialize interface panels!!!
00572                         if ( guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
00573                         {
00574                               SetCurrentSquad( pVehicleSoldier->bAssignment, TRUE );
00575                         }
00576                   }
00577 
00578                   return( TRUE );
00579             }
00580       }
00581 
00582             // no slots, leave
00583       return( FALSE );
00584 }

00587 void SetSoldierExitVehicleInsertionData( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT32 iId )
00588 {
00589       if ( iId == iHelicopterVehicleId && !pSoldier->bInSector )
00590   {
00591         if( pSoldier->sSectorX  != BOBBYR_SHIPPING_DEST_SECTOR_X || pSoldier->sSectorY != BOBBYR_SHIPPING_DEST_SECTOR_Y || pSoldier->bSectorZ != BOBBYR_SHIPPING_DEST_SECTOR_Z )
00592     {
00593       // Not anything different here - just use center gridno......
00594               pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_CENTER;
00595     }
00596     else
00597     {
00598       // This is drassen, make insertion gridno specific...
00599               pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_GRIDNO;
00600               pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData = 10125;
00601     }
00602   }
00603 }
00604 
00605 BOOLEAN RemoveSoldierFromVehicle( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT32 iId )
00606 {
00607       // remove soldier from vehicle
00608       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00609       BOOLEAN fSoldierLeft = FALSE;
00610       BOOLEAN     fSoldierFound = FALSE;
00611       SOLDIERTYPE *pVehicleSoldier;
00612 
00613 
00614       if( ( iId >= ubNumberOfVehicles ) || ( iId < 0 ) )
00615       {
00616             return( FALSE );
00617       }
00618 
00619       // now check if vehicle is valid
00620       if( pVehicleList[ iId ].fValid == FALSE )
00621       {
00622             return( FALSE );
00623       }
00624 
00625       // now look for the grunt
00626       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iSeatingCapacities[ pVehicleList[ iId ].ubVehicleType ]; iCounter++ )
00627       {
00628             if( pVehicleList[ iId ].pPassengers[ iCounter ] == pSoldier )
00629             {
00630                   fSoldierFound = TRUE;
00631 
00632                   pVehicleList[ iId ].pPassengers[ iCounter ]->ubGroupID = 0;
00633                   pVehicleList[ iId ].pPassengers[ iCounter ]->sSectorY = pVehicleList[ iId ].sSectorY;
00634                   pVehicleList[ iId ].pPassengers[ iCounter ]->sSectorX = pVehicleList[ iId ].sSectorX;
00635                   pVehicleList[ iId ].pPassengers[ iCounter ]->bSectorZ = ( INT8 )pVehicleList[ iId ].sSectorZ;
00636                   pVehicleList[ iId ].pPassengers[ iCounter ] = NULL;
00637                   
00638                   
00639                   pSoldier->uiStatusFlags &= ( ~( SOLDIER_DRIVER | SOLDIER_PASSENGER ) );
00640 
00641                   // check if anyone left in vehicle
00642                   fSoldierLeft = FALSE;
00643                   for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iSeatingCapacities[ pVehicleList[ iId ].ubVehicleType ]; iCounter++ )
00644                   {
00645                         if( pVehicleList[ iId ].pPassengers[ iCounter ] != NULL )
00646                         {
00647                               fSoldierLeft = TRUE;
00648                         }
00649                   }
00650 
00651                   
00652                   if( pVehicleList[ iId ].ubMovementGroup != 0 )
00653                   {
00654                         RemovePlayerFromGroup( pVehicleList[ iId ].ubMovementGroup, pSoldier );
00655 
00656 /* ARM 20-01-99, now gonna disallow exiting vehicles between sectors except if merc is leaving (fired, dies, contract runs out)
00657                                                       in which case we don't need to give them up for anything movement related since they're gone.
00658 
00659                         // check if vehicle was between sectors, if so, grunt must go it on foot
00660                         if( pVehicleList[ iId ].fBetweenSectors == TRUE )
00661                         {
00662                               RemoveSoldierFromVehicleBetweenSectors( pSoldier, iId );
00663                         }
00664 */
00665                   }
00666 
00667                   break;
00668             }
00669       }
00670 
00671 
00672       if ( !fSoldierFound )
00673       {
00674             return( FALSE );        
00675       }
00676 
00677 
00678       // Are we the last?
00679       //if ( GetNumberInVehicle( iId ) == 0 )
00680       if( fSoldierLeft == FALSE )
00681       {
00682             // is the vehicle the helicopter?..it can continue moving when no soldiers aboard (Skyrider remains)
00683             if( iId != iHelicopterVehicleId )
00684             {
00685                   pVehicleSoldier = GetSoldierStructureForVehicle( iId );
00686                   Assert ( pVehicleSoldier );
00687 
00688                   if ( pVehicleSoldier )
00689                   {
00690                         // and he has a route set
00691                         if ( GetLengthOfMercPath( pVehicleSoldier ) > 0 )
00692                         {
00693                               // cancel the entire path (also handles reversing directions)
00694                               CancelPathForVehicle( &( pVehicleList[ iId ] ), FALSE );
00695                         }
00696 
00697                         // if the vehicle was abandoned between sectors
00698                         if ( pVehicleList[ iId ].fBetweenSectors )
00699                         {
00700                               // teleport it to the closer of its current and next sectors (it beats having it arrive empty later)
00701                               TeleportVehicleToItsClosestSector( iId, pVehicleSoldier->ubGroupID );
00702                         }
00703 
00704         // Remove vehicle from squad.....
00705         RemoveCharacterFromSquads( pVehicleSoldier );
00706         // ATE: Add him back to vehicle group!
00707         if ( !DoesPlayerExistInPGroup( pVehicleList[ iId ].ubMovementGroup, pVehicleSoldier ) )
00708         {
00709               AddPlayerToGroup( pVehicleList[ iId ].ubMovementGroup, pVehicleSoldier  );
00710         }
00711                         ChangeSoldiersAssignment( pVehicleSoldier, ASSIGNMENT_EMPTY );
00712 
00713 
00714 /* ARM Removed Feb. 17, 99 - causes pVehicleSoldier->ubGroupID to become 0, which will cause assert later on
00715                         RemovePlayerFromGroup( pVehicleSoldier->ubGroupID, pVehicleSoldier );
00716 */
00717 
00718 /*
00719                         // Change sides...
00720                         pVehicleSoldier = ChangeSoldierTeam( pVehicleSoldier, CIV_TEAM );
00721                         // subtract it from mapscreen list
00722                         fReBuildCharacterList = TRUE;
00723 
00724                         RemoveCharacterFromSquads( pVehicleSoldier );
00725 */
00726                   }
00727             }
00728       }
00729 
00730 
00731       // if he got out of the chopper
00732       if ( iId == iHelicopterVehicleId )
00733       {
00734             // and he's alive
00735             if ( pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
00736             {
00737                   // mark the sector as visited (flying around in the chopper doesn't, so this does it as soon as we get off it)
00738                   SetSectorFlag( pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY, pSoldier->bSectorZ, SF_ALREADY_VISITED );
00739             }
00740 
00741     SetSoldierExitVehicleInsertionData( pSoldier, iId );
00742 
00743     // Update in sector if this is the current sector.....
00744             if ( pSoldier->sSectorX == gWorldSectorX && pSoldier->sSectorY == gWorldSectorY && pSoldier->bSectorZ == gbWorldSectorZ )
00745             {
00746                   UpdateMercInSector( pSoldier, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
00747             }
00748 
00749       }
00750 
00751       // soldier successfully removed
00752       return( TRUE );
00753 }

00756 /*
00757 void RemoveSoldierFromVehicleBetweenSectors( pSoldier, iId )
00758 {
00759       GROUP *pGroup;
00760       INT32 iCurrentCostInTime = 0;
00761       INT8 bDelta = 0;
00762       UINT8 ubCurrent, ubNext, ubDirection, ubSector;
00763       UINT8 ubNextX, ubNextY, ubPrevX, ubPrevY;
00764       UINT32 uiTraverseTime, uiArriveTime;
00765       UINT8 ubGroupId;
00766       float flTripFractionCovered;
00767 
00768 
00769       // set up a mvt group for the grunt
00770       pSoldier->fBetweenSectors = TRUE;
00771 
00772       // ok, the guy wasn't in a squad
00773       // get his mvt groups position and set the squads to this
00774       GetGroupPosition(&ubNextX, &ubNextY, &ubPrevX, &ubPrevY, &uiTraverseTime, &uiArriveTime, pVehicleList[ iId ].ubMovementGroup );
00775 
00776       ubGroupId = CreateNewPlayerGroupDepartingFromSector( ( INT8 ) ( pSoldier -> sSectorX ) , ( INT8 ) ( pSoldier -> sSectorY ) );
00777 
00778       // assign to a group
00779       AddPlayerToGroup( ubGroupId, pSoldier );
00780 
00781       // get the group
00782       pGroup = GetGroup( ubGroupId );
00783 
00784 
00785       // find total time for traversal between sectors for foot mvt type
00786 
00787       // get current and next sector values (DON'T use prevX, prevY, that's the sector BEFORE the current one!!!)
00788       ubCurrent = CALCULATE_STRATEGIC_INDEX( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY );
00789       ubNext = CALCULATE_STRATEGIC_INDEX( ubNextX, ubNextY );
00790 
00791       // handle errors
00792       Assert( ubCurrent != ubNext );
00793       if ( ubCurrent == ubNext )
00794             continue;
00795 
00796       // which direction are we moving in?
00797       bDelta = (INT8) ubNext - ubCurrent;
00798       if( bDelta > 0 )
00799       {
00800             if( bDelta % SOUTH_MOVE == 0 )
00801             {
00802                   ubDirection = SOUTH_STRATEGIC_MOVE;
00803             }
00804             else
00805             {
00806                   ubDirection = EAST_STRATEGIC_MOVE;
00807             }
00808       }
00809       else
00810       {
00811             if( bDelta % NORTH_MOVE == 0 )
00812             {
00813                   ubDirection = NORTH_STRATEGIC_MOVE;
00814             }
00815             else
00816             {
00817                   ubDirection = WEST_STRATEGIC_MOVE;
00818             }
00819       }
00820 
00821 
00822       // calculate how long the entire trip would have taken on foot
00823       ubSector = ( UINT8 ) SECTOR( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY );
00824       iCurrentCostInTime = GetSectorMvtTimeForGroup( ubSector, ubDirection, pGroup );
00825 
00826       if( iCurrentCostInTime == 0xffffffff )
00827       {
00828             AssertMsg( 0, String("Group %d (%s) attempting illegal move from sector %d, dir %d (%s).", 
00829                         pGroup->ubGroupID, ( pGroup->fPlayer ) ? "Player" : "AI",
00830                         ubSector, ubDirection,
00831                         gszTerrain[SectorInfo[ubSector].ubTraversability[ubDirection]] ) );
00832       }
00833 
00834       // figure out what how far along ( percentage ) the vehicle's trip duration we bailed out at
00835       flTripFractionCovered = ( uiTraverseTime - uiArriveTime + GetWorldTotalMin( ) ) / (float)uiTraverseTime;
00836 
00837       // calculate how much longer we have to go on foot to get there
00838       uiArriveTime = ( UINT32 )( ( ( 1.0 - flTripFractionCovered ) * ( float )iCurrentCostInTime ) + GetWorldTotalMin( ) );
00839 
00840       SetGroupPosition( ubNextX, ubNextY, ubPrevX, ubPrevY, iCurrentCostInTime, uiArriveTime, pSoldier -> ubGroupID );
00841 
00842 // ARM: if this is ever reactivated, there seem to be the following additional problems:
00843       1) The soldier removed isn't showing any DEST.  Must set up his strategic path/destination.
00844       2) The arrive time seems to be much later than it should have been, suggesting the math above is wrong somehow
00845       3) Reassigning multiple mercs at once out of a vehicle onroute doesn't work 'cause the group is between sectors so only
00846                   the first merc gets added successfully, the others all fail.
00847 }
00848 */
00849

00851 
00852 BOOLEAN MoveCharactersPathToVehicle( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00853 {
00854       INT32 iId;
00855       // valid soldier?
00856       if( pSoldier == NULL )
00857       {
00858             return ( FALSE );
00859       }
00860 
00861       // check if character is in fact in a vehicle
00862       if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment != VEHICLE ) && ( ! ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) ) )
00863       {
00864             // now clear soldier's path
00865             pSoldier->pMercPath = ClearStrategicPathList( pSoldier->pMercPath, 0 );
00866             return( FALSE );
00867       }
00868 
00869       if( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
00870       {
00871             // grab the id the character is
00872             iId = pSoldier->bVehicleID;
00873       }
00874       else
00875       {
00876             // grab the id the character is
00877             iId = pSoldier->iVehicleId;
00878       }
00879 
00880       // check if vehicle is valid
00881       if( iId != -1 )
00882       {
00883             // check if vehicle has mvt group, if not, get one for it
00884             if( ( iId >= ubNumberOfVehicles ) || ( iId < 0 ) )
00885             {
00886                   // now clear soldier's path
00887                   pSoldier->pMercPath = ClearStrategicPathList( pSoldier->pMercPath, 0 );
00888                   return ( FALSE );
00889             }
00890             
00891             // now check if vehicle is valid
00892             if( pVehicleList[ iId ].fValid == FALSE )
00893             {
00894                   // now clear soldier's path
00895                   pSoldier->pMercPath = ClearStrategicPathList( pSoldier->pMercPath, 0 );
00896                   return( FALSE );
00897             }
00898       }
00899 
00900 
00901       // valid vehicle
00902 
00903       // now clear soldier's path
00904       pVehicleList[ iId ].pMercPath = ClearStrategicPathList( pVehicleList[ iId ].pMercPath, pVehicleList[ iId ].ubMovementGroup );
00905 
00906       // now copy over
00907       pVehicleList[ iId ].pMercPath = CopyPaths( pSoldier->pMercPath, pVehicleList[ iId ].pMercPath );
00908 
00909       // move to beginning
00910       pVehicleList[ iId ].pMercPath = MoveToBeginningOfPathList( pVehicleList[ iId ].pMercPath );
00911 
00912       // now clear soldier's path
00913       pSoldier->pMercPath = ClearStrategicPathList( pSoldier->pMercPath, 0 );
00914 
00915       return( TRUE );
00916 }
00917 
00918 BOOLEAN CopyVehiclePathToSoldier( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00919 {
00920       INT32 iId;
00921 
00922       // valid soldier?
00923       if( pSoldier == NULL )
00924       {
00925             return ( FALSE );
00926       }
00927 
00928       // check if character is in fact in a vehicle
00929       if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment != VEHICLE ) && ( ! ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) ) )
00930       {
00931             return( FALSE );
00932       }
00933 
00934       if( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
00935       {
00936             // grab the id the character is
00937             iId = pSoldier->bVehicleID;
00938       }
00939       else
00940       {
00941             // grab the id the character is
00942             iId = pSoldier->iVehicleId;
00943       }
00944 
00945       // check if vehicle is valid
00946       if( iId != -1 )
00947       {
00948             // check if vehicle has mvt group, if not, get one for it
00949             if( ( iId >= ubNumberOfVehicles ) || ( iId < 0 ) )
00950             {
00951                   return ( FALSE );
00952             }
00953             
00954             // now check if vehicle is valid
00955             if( pVehicleList[ iId ].fValid == FALSE )
00956             {
00957                   return( FALSE );
00958             }
00959       }
00960 
00961 
00962       // reset mvt group for the grunt
00963       // ATE: NOT if we are the vehicle
00964       if ( !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
00965       {
00966             pSoldier->ubGroupID = pVehicleList[ iId ].ubMovementGroup;
00967       }
00968       
00969       // valid vehicle
00970 
00971       // clear grunt path
00972       if( pSoldier->pMercPath )
00973       {
00974             // clear soldier's path
00975             pSoldier->pMercPath = ClearStrategicPathList( pSoldier->pMercPath, 0 );
00976       }
00977 
00978       // now copy over
00979       pSoldier->pMercPath = CopyPaths(pVehicleList[ iId ].pMercPath, pSoldier->pMercPath );
00980 
00981       return( TRUE );
00982 
00983 }

00986 BOOLEAN SetUpMvtGroupForVehicle( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00987 {
00988       // given this grunt, find out if asscoiated vehicle has a mvt group, if so, set this grunts mvt group tho the vehicle
00989       // for pathing purposes, will be reset to zero in copying of path
00990       INT32 iId = 0;
00991 #ifndef RELEASE_WITH_DEBUG_INFO
00992       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00993 #endif // RELEASE_WITH_DEBUG_INFO
00994 
00995             // check if character is in fact in a vehicle
00996       if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment != VEHICLE ) && ( ! ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) ) )
00997       {
00998             return( FALSE );
00999       }
01000 
01001       if( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
01002       {
01003             // grab the id the character is
01004             iId = pSoldier->bVehicleID;
01005       }
01006       else
01007       {
01008             // grab the id the character is
01009             iId = pSoldier->iVehicleId;
01010       }
01011 
01012       if( pSoldier->pMercPath )
01013       {
01014             // clear soldier's path
01015             pSoldier->pMercPath = ClearStrategicPathList( pSoldier->pMercPath, pSoldier->ubGroupID );
01016       }
01017 
01018       // if no group, create one for vehicle
01019       //if( pVehicleList[ iId ].ubMovementGroup == 0 )
01020       //{
01021             // get the vehicle a mvt group
01022             //pVehicleList[ iId ].ubMovementGroup = CreateNewVehicleGroupDepartingFromSector( ( UINT8 )( pVehicleList[ iId ].sSectorX ), ( UINT8 )( pVehicleList[ iId ].sSectorY ), iId );
01023             //pVehicleList[ iId ].ubMovementGroup = CreateNewVehicleGroupDepartingFromSector( ( UINT8 )( pVehicleList[ iId ].sSectorX ), ( UINT8 )( pVehicleList[ iId ].sSectorY ), iId );
01024 
01025 
01026             // add everyone in vehicle to this mvt group
01027             //for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iSeatingCapacities[ pVehicleList[ iId ].ubVehicleType ]; iCounter++ )
01028             //{
01029             //    if( pVehicleList[ iId ].pPassengers[ iCounter ] != NULL )
01030             //    {
01031             //                // add character
01032             //          AddPlayerToGroup( pVehicleList[ iId ].ubMovementGroup, pVehicleList[ iId ].pPassengers[ iCounter ] );
01033             //    }
01034             //}
01035       //}
01036 
01037       CopyVehiclePathToSoldier( pSoldier );
01038 
01039       // set up mvt group
01040       pSoldier->ubGroupID = pVehicleList[ iId ].ubMovementGroup;
01041 
01042 
01043       return ( TRUE );
01044 }
01045 BOOLEAN VehicleIdIsValid( INT32 iId )
01046 {
01047       // check if vehicle has mvt group, if not, get one for it
01048       if( ( iId >= ubNumberOfVehicles ) || ( iId < 0 ) )
01049       {
01050             return ( FALSE );
01051       }
01052             // now check if vehicle is valid
01053       if( pVehicleList[ iId ].fValid == FALSE )
01054       {
01055             return( FALSE );
01056       }
01057 
01058       return( TRUE );
01059 }
01060 
01061 // get travel time of vehicle
01062 INT32 GetTravelTimeOfVehicle( INT32 iId )
01063 {
01064       GROUP *pGroup;
01065 
01066       
01067       // valid vehicle?
01068       if( VehicleIdIsValid( iId ) == FALSE )
01069       {
01070             return( 0 );
01071       }
01072 
01073       // no mvt group?
01074       if( pVehicleList[ iId ].ubMovementGroup == 0 )
01075       {
01076             return ( 0 );
01077       }
01078 
01079       pGroup = GetGroup( pVehicleList[ iId ].ubMovementGroup );
01080 
01081       if( pGroup == NULL )
01082       {
01083             pVehicleList[ iId ].ubMovementGroup = 0;
01084             return( 0 );
01085       }
01086 
01087       return( CalculateTravelTimeOfGroupId( pVehicleList[ iId ].ubMovementGroup ) );
01088 }

01091 
01092 void UpdatePositionOfMercsInVehicle( INT32 iId )
01093 {
01094       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01095 
01096       // update the position of all the grunts in the vehicle
01097       if( VehicleIdIsValid( iId ) == FALSE )
01098       {
01099             return;
01100       }
01101 
01102       // go through list of mercs in vehicle and set all thier states as arrived
01103       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iSeatingCapacities[ pVehicleList[ iId ].ubVehicleType ]; iCounter++ )
01104       {
01105             if( pVehicleList[ iId ].pPassengers[ iCounter ] != NULL )
01106             {
01107                   pVehicleList[ iId ].pPassengers[ iCounter ]->sSectorY = pVehicleList[ iId ].sSectorY;
01108                   pVehicleList[ iId ].pPassengers[ iCounter ]->sSectorX = pVehicleList[ iId ].sSectorX;
01109                   pVehicleList[ iId ].pPassengers[ iCounter ]->fBetweenSectors = FALSE;
01110             }
01111       }
01112 
01113       return;
01114 }
01115 
01116 
01117 
01118 INT32 GivenMvtGroupIdFindVehicleId( UINT8 ubGroupId )
01119 {
01120       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01121 
01122       // given the id of a mvt group, find a vehicle in this group
01123       if( ubGroupId == 0 )
01124       {
01125             return ( -1 );
01126       }
01127 
01128       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < ubNumberOfVehicles ; iCounter++ )
01129       {
01130             // might have an empty slot
01131             if( pVehicleList[ iCounter ].fValid == TRUE )
01132             {
01133                   if( pVehicleList[ iCounter ].ubMovementGroup == ubGroupId )
01134                   {
01135                         return( iCounter ); 
01136                   }
01137             }
01138       }
01139 
01140       return( -1 );
01141 }
01142 
01143 // add all people in this vehicle to the mvt group for benifit of prebattle interface
01144 BOOLEAN AddVehicleMembersToMvtGroup( INT32 iId )
01145 {
01146       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01147 
01148       if( VehicleIdIsValid( iId ) == FALSE )
01149       {
01150             return( FALSE );
01151       }
01152 
01153       // clear the vehicle people list out
01154       // RemoveAllPlayersFromGroup( pVehicleList[ iId ].ubMovementGroup );
01155 
01156       // go through list of mercs in vehicle and set all thier states as arrived
01157       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iSeatingCapacities[ pVehicleList[ iId ].ubVehicleType ]; iCounter++ )
01158       {
01159             if( pVehicleList[ iId ].pPassengers[ iCounter ] != NULL )
01160             {
01161                   AddPlayerToGroup( pVehicleList[ iId ].ubMovementGroup , pVehicleList[ iId ].pPassengers[ iCounter ] );
01162             }
01163       }
01164 
01165       return( TRUE );
01166 }

01168 
01169 BOOLEAN InjurePersonInVehicle( INT32 iId, SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubPointsOfDmg )
01170 {
01171       // find this person, see if they have this many pts left, if not, kill them
01172 
01173 
01174       // find if vehicle is valid
01175       if( VehicleIdIsValid( iId ) == FALSE )
01176       {
01177             return ( FALSE );
01178       }
01179 
01180       // check if soldier is valid
01181       if( pSoldier == NULL )
01182       {
01183             return ( FALSE );
01184       }
01185 
01186       // now check hpts of merc
01187       if( pSoldier->bLife == 0 )
01188       {
01189             // guy is dead, leave
01190             return( FALSE );
01191       }
01192 
01193       // see if we will infact kill them
01194       if( ubPointsOfDmg >= pSoldier->bLife )
01195       {
01196             return( KillPersonInVehicle( iId, pSoldier ) );
01197       }
01198 
01199       // otherwise hurt them
01200       SoldierTakeDamage( pSoldier, 0, ubPointsOfDmg, ubPointsOfDmg, TAKE_DAMAGE_GUNFIRE, NOBODY, NOWHERE, 0, TRUE );
01201 
01202       HandleSoldierTakeDamageFeedback( pSoldier );
01203 
01204       return( TRUE );
01205 }
01206 
01207 BOOLEAN KillPersonInVehicle( INT32 iId, SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01208 {
01209       // find if vehicle is valid
01210       if( VehicleIdIsValid( iId ) == FALSE )
01211       {
01212             return ( FALSE );
01213       }
01214 
01215       // check if soldier is valid
01216       if( pSoldier == NULL )
01217       {
01218             return ( FALSE );
01219       }
01220 
01221       // now check hpts of merc
01222       if( pSoldier->bLife == 0 )
01223       {
01224             // guy is dead, leave
01225             return( FALSE );
01226       }
01227 
01228       // otherwise hurt them
01229       SoldierTakeDamage( pSoldier, 0, 100, 100, TAKE_DAMAGE_BLOODLOSS, NOBODY, NOWHERE, 0, TRUE );
01230 
01231       return( TRUE );
01232 }
01233 
01234 BOOLEAN KillAllInVehicle( INT32 iId )
01235 {
01236       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01237 
01238       // find if vehicle is valid
01239       if( VehicleIdIsValid( iId ) == FALSE )
01240       {
01241             return ( FALSE );
01242       }
01243 
01244       // go through list of occupants and kill them
01245       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iSeatingCapacities[ pVehicleList[ iId ].ubVehicleType ]; iCounter++ )
01246       {
01247             if( pVehicleList[ iId ].pPassengers[ iCounter ] != NULL )
01248             {
01249                   if( KillPersonInVehicle( iId , pVehicleList[ iId ].pPassengers[ iCounter ] ) == FALSE )
01250                   {
01251                         return( FALSE );
01252                   }
01253             }
01254       }
01255 
01256       return ( TRUE );
01257 }
01258 
01259 INT32 GetNumberInVehicle( INT32 iId )
01260 {
01261       // go through list of occupants in vehicles and count them
01262       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01263       INT32 iCount = 0;
01264 
01265       // find if vehicle is valid
01266       if( VehicleIdIsValid( iId ) == FALSE )
01267       {
01268             return ( 0 );
01269       }
01270 
01271       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iSeatingCapacities[ pVehicleList[ iId ].ubVehicleType ]; iCounter++ )
01272       {
01273             if( pVehicleList[ iId ].pPassengers[ iCounter ] != NULL )
01274             {
01275                   iCount++;
01276             }
01277       }
01278 
01279       return( iCount );
01280 }
01281 
01282 INT32 GetNumberOfNonEPCsInVehicle( INT32 iId )
01283 {
01284       // go through list of occupants in vehicles and count them
01285       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01286       INT32 iCount = 0;
01287 
01288       // find if vehicle is valid
01289       if( VehicleIdIsValid( iId ) == FALSE )
01290       {
01291             return ( 0 );
01292       }
01293 
01294       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iSeatingCapacities[ pVehicleList[ iId ].ubVehicleType ]; iCounter++ )
01295       {
01296             if( pVehicleList[ iId ].pPassengers[ iCounter ] != NULL && !AM_AN_EPC( pVehicleList[ iId ].pPassengers[ iCounter ] ) )
01297             {
01298                   iCount++;
01299             }
01300       }
01301 
01302       return( iCount );
01303 }
01304 
01305 BOOLEAN IsRobotControllerInVehicle( INT32 iId )
01306 {
01307       // go through list of occupants in vehicles and count them
01308       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01309       SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier;
01310 
01311       // find if vehicle is valid
01312       if( VehicleIdIsValid( iId ) == FALSE )
01313       {
01314             return ( 0 );
01315       }
01316 
01317       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iSeatingCapacities[ pVehicleList[ iId ].ubVehicleType ]; iCounter++ )
01318       {
01319             pSoldier = pVehicleList[ iId ].pPassengers[ iCounter ];
01320             if ( pSoldier != NULL && ControllingRobot( pSoldier ) )
01321             {
01322                   return( TRUE );
01323             }
01324       }
01325 
01326       return( FALSE );
01327 }

01331 BOOLEAN AnyAccessibleVehiclesInSoldiersSector( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01332 {
01333       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01334 
01335       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < ubNumberOfVehicles ; iCounter++ )
01336       {
01337             if ( pVehicleList[ iCounter ].fValid == TRUE )
01338             {
01339                   if ( IsThisVehicleAccessibleToSoldier( pSoldier, iCounter ) )
01340                   {
01341                         return( TRUE );
01342                   }
01343             }
01344       }
01345 
01346       return( FALSE );
01347 }

01368 
01369 BOOLEAN IsEnoughSpaceInVehicle( INT32 iID )
01370 {
01371       // find if vehicle is valid
01372       if( VehicleIdIsValid( iID ) == FALSE )
01373       {
01374             return ( FALSE );
01375       }
01376 
01377       if ( GetNumberInVehicle( iID ) == iSeatingCapacities[ pVehicleList[ iID ].ubVehicleType ] )
01378       {
01379             return( FALSE );
01380       }
01381 
01382       return( TRUE );
01383 }
01384 
01385 BOOLEAN PutSoldierInVehicle( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT8 bVehicleId )
01386 {
01387 
01388       SOLDIERTYPE *pVehicleSoldier = NULL;
01389 
01390       if( ( pSoldier->sSectorX != gWorldSectorX ) || ( pSoldier->sSectorY != gWorldSectorY ) || ( pSoldier->bSectorZ != 0 ) || ( bVehicleId  == iHelicopterVehicleId ) )
01391       {
01392             // add the soldier 
01393             return( AddSoldierToVehicle( pSoldier, bVehicleId ) );
01394       }
01395       else
01396       {
01397             // grab the soldier struct for the vehicle
01398             pVehicleSoldier = GetSoldierStructureForVehicle( bVehicleId );
01399 
01400             // enter the vehicle
01401             return( EnterVehicle( pVehicleSoldier, pSoldier ) );
01402       }
01403 }
01404 
01405 
01406 BOOLEAN TakeSoldierOutOfVehicle( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01407 {
01408       // if not in vehicle, don't take out, not much point, now is there?
01409       if( pSoldier->bAssignment != VEHICLE )
01410       {
01411             return( FALSE );
01412       }
01413 
01414       if( ( pSoldier->sSectorX != gWorldSectorX ) || ( pSoldier->sSectorY != gWorldSectorY ) || ( pSoldier->bSectorZ != 0 ) || !pSoldier->bInSector )
01415       {
01416             // add the soldier 
01417             return( RemoveSoldierFromVehicle( pSoldier, pSoldier->iVehicleId ) );
01418       }
01419       else
01420       {
01421             // helicopter isn't a soldiertype instance
01422             if( pSoldier->iVehicleId == iHelicopterVehicleId )
01423             {
01424                   return( RemoveSoldierFromVehicle( pSoldier, pSoldier->iVehicleId ) );
01425             }
01426             else
01427             {
01428                   // exit the vehicle
01429                   return( ExitVehicle( pSoldier ) );
01430             }
01431       }
01432 }
01433 
01434 
01435 
01436 BOOLEAN EnterVehicle( SOLDIERTYPE *pVehicle, SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01437 {
01438       INT16 sOldGridNo = 0;
01439 
01440       // TEST IF IT'S VALID...
01441       if ( pVehicle->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
01442       {
01443             // Is there room...
01444             if ( IsEnoughSpaceInVehicle( pVehicle->bVehicleID ) )
01445             {
01446                   // OK, add....
01447                   AddSoldierToVehicle( pSoldier, pVehicle->bVehicleID );
01448 
01449                   if ( !(guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) )
01450                   {
01451                         // Change to team panel if we are not already...
01452                         SetCurrentInterfacePanel( TEAM_PANEL );
01453                   }
01454 
01455                   return( TRUE );
01456             }
01457       }
01458 
01459       return( FALSE );
01460 }
01461 
01462 SOLDIERTYPE *GetVehicleSoldierPointerFromPassenger( SOLDIERTYPE *pSrcSoldier )
01463 {
01464       UINT32                                                      cnt;
01465       SOLDIERTYPE             *pSoldier;
01466 
01467       // End the turn of player charactors
01468       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
01469 
01470   // look for all mercs on the same team, 
01471   for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
01472       {       
01473             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
01474             {
01475                   // Check ubID....
01476                   if ( pSoldier->bVehicleID == pSrcSoldier->iVehicleId )
01477                   {
01478                         return( pSoldier );
01479                   }
01480             }
01481       }
01482       
01483       return( NULL );
01484 }
01485 
01486 
01487 BOOLEAN ExitVehicle( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01488 {
01489       SOLDIERTYPE       *pVehicle;
01490       UINT8                         ubDirection;
01491       INT16                         sGridNo;
01492 
01493       // Get vehicle from soldier...
01494       pVehicle = GetVehicleSoldierPointerFromPassenger( pSoldier );
01495 
01496       if ( pVehicle == NULL )
01497       {
01498             return( FALSE );
01499       }
01500 
01501       // TEST IF IT'S VALID...
01502       if ( pVehicle->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
01503       {
01504             sGridNo = FindGridNoFromSweetSpotWithStructDataFromSoldier( pSoldier, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, 5, &ubDirection, 3, pVehicle );
01505 
01506             if ( sGridNo == NOWHERE )
01507             {
01508                   // ATE: BUT we need a place, widen the search
01509                   sGridNo = FindGridNoFromSweetSpotWithStructDataFromSoldier( pSoldier, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, 20, &ubDirection, 3, pVehicle );
01510             }
01511 
01512             // OK, remove....
01513             RemoveSoldierFromVehicle( pSoldier, pVehicle->bVehicleID );
01514 
01515             // Were we the driver, and if so, pick another....
01516             pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo = sGridNo;
01517             pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_GRIDNO;
01518             pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData = pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo;
01519             pSoldier->iVehicleId = -1;
01520 
01521             //AllTeamsLookForAll( FALSE );
01522             pSoldier->bOppList[ pVehicle->ubID ] = 1;
01523 
01524             // Add to sector....
01525             EVENT_SetSoldierPosition( pSoldier, CenterX( sGridNo ), CenterY( sGridNo ) );
01526             
01527             // Update visiblity.....
01528             HandleSight(pSoldier,SIGHT_LOOK | SIGHT_RADIO );
01529             
01530             // Add to unique squad....
01531             AddCharacterToUniqueSquad( pSoldier );
01532 
01533             // can't call SetCurrentSquad OR SelectSoldier in mapscreen, that will initialize interface panels!!!
01534         if ( guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
01535             {
01536                   SetCurrentSquad( pSoldier->bAssignment, TRUE );
01537 
01538                   SelectSoldier( pSoldier->ubID, FALSE, TRUE );
01539             }
01540 
01541             PlayJA2Sample( pVehicleList[ pVehicle->bVehicleID ].iOutOfSound, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( HIGHVOLUME, pVehicle->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pVehicle->sGridNo ) );
01542             return( TRUE );
01543       }
01544 
01545       return( FALSE );
01546 }
01547 
01548 
01549 void AddPassangersToTeamPanel( INT32 iId )
01550 {
01551       INT32 cnt;
01552 
01553       for( cnt = 0; cnt < iSeatingCapacities[ pVehicleList[ iId ].ubVehicleType ]; cnt++ )
01554       {
01555             if( pVehicleList[ iId ].pPassengers[ cnt ] != NULL )
01556             {
01557                   // add character
01558                   AddPlayerToInterfaceTeamSlot( pVehicleList[ iId ].pPassengers[ cnt ]->ubID );
01559             }
01560       }
01561 }

01563 
01564 void VehicleTakeDamage( UINT8 ubID, UINT8 ubReason, INT16 sDamage, INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubAttackerID )
01565 {
01566       INT16 sOldDmgValue = 0;
01567 
01568   if ( ubReason != TAKE_DAMAGE_GAS )
01569   {
01570       PlayJA2Sample( (UINT32)( S_METAL_IMPACT3 ), RATE_11025, SoundVolume( MIDVOLUME, sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( sGridNo ) );                
01571   }
01572 
01573       // check if there was in fact damage done to the vehicle
01574       if( ( ubReason == TAKE_DAMAGE_HANDTOHAND ) || ( ubReason == TAKE_DAMAGE_GAS ) )
01575       {
01576             // nope
01577             return;
01578       }
01579 
01580       if( pVehicleList[ ubID ].fDestroyed == FALSE )
01581       {
01582             switch( ubReason )
01583             {
01584                   case( TAKE_DAMAGE_GUNFIRE ):
01585                   case( TAKE_DAMAGE_EXPLOSION):
01586                   case( TAKE_DAMAGE_STRUCTURE_EXPLOSION):
01587 
01588                   HandleCriticalHitForVehicleInLocation( ubID, sDamage, sGridNo, ubAttackerID );
01589                   break;
01590             }
01591       }
01592 }
01593 
01594 
01595 void HandleCriticalHitForVehicleInLocation( UINT8 ubID, INT16 sDmg, INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubAttackerID )
01596 {
01597       // check state the armor was s'posed to be in vs. the current state..the difference / orig state is % chance
01598       // that a critical hit will occur
01599       INT16 sOrigValue = 0, sCurrValue = 0;
01600       FLOAT fChance = 0.0;
01601       INT32 iRand = 0, iCrit = 0;
01602       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
01603       BOOLEAN     fDestroyVehicle = FALSE;
01604       BOOLEAN     fMadeCorpse = FALSE;
01605 
01606 #if 0
01607             {
01608                   // injure someone inside
01609                   iRand = Random( iSeatingCapacities[ pVehicleList[ ubID ].ubVehicleType ] );
01610                   if( pVehicleList[ ubID ].pPassengers[ iRand ] )
01611                   {
01612                         // hurt this person
01613                         InjurePersonInVehicle( ( INT16 )ubID, pVehicleList[ ubID ].pPassengers[ iRand ], ( UINT8 )( sDmg / 2 ) );
01614                   }
01615             }
01616 
01617             ScreenMsg( FONT_BLACK, MSG_INTERFACE, sCritLocationStrings[ iCrit ] );
01618       }
01619 #endif
01620 
01621       pSoldier = GetSoldierStructureForVehicle( ubID );
01622 
01623       if ( sDmg > pSoldier->bLife )
01624       {
01625             pSoldier->bLife = 0;    
01626       }
01627       else
01628       {
01629             // Decrease Health
01630             pSoldier->bLife -= sDmg;
01631       }
01632 
01633       if ( pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE )
01634       {
01635             pSoldier->bLife = 0;
01636       }
01637 
01638       //Show damage
01639       pSoldier->sDamage += sDmg;
01640 
01641       if ( pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->bVisible != -1 )
01642       {
01643             // If we are already dead, don't show damage!
01644             if ( sDmg != 0 )
01645             {
01646                   // Display damage
01647                   INT16 sMercScreenX, sMercScreenY, sOffsetX, sOffsetY;
01648 
01649                   // Set Damage display counter
01650                   pSoldier->fDisplayDamage = TRUE;
01651                   pSoldier->bDisplayDamageCount = 0;
01652 
01653                   GetSoldierScreenPos( pSoldier, &sMercScreenX, &sMercScreenY );
01654                   GetSoldierAnimOffsets( pSoldier, &sOffsetX, &sOffsetY );
01655                   pSoldier->sDamageX = sOffsetX;
01656                   pSoldier->sDamageY = sOffsetY;
01657             }
01658       }
01659 
01660       if ( pSoldier->bLife == 0 && !pVehicleList[ ubID ].fDestroyed )
01661       {
01662             pVehicleList[ ubID ].fDestroyed  = TRUE;
01663 
01664             // Explode vehicle...
01665             IgniteExplosion( ubAttackerID, CenterX( sGridNo ), CenterY( sGridNo ), 0, sGridNo, GREAT_BIG_EXPLOSION, 0 );
01666 
01667             if ( pSoldier != NULL )
01668             {
01669                   // Tacticlly remove soldier....
01670                   // EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, VEHICLE_DIE, 0, FALSE );
01671                   //TacticalRemoveSoldier( pSoldier->ubID );
01672 
01673                   CheckForAndHandleSoldierDeath( pSoldier, &fMadeCorpse );
01674             }
01675 
01676     // Kill all in vehicle...
01677     KillAllInVehicle( ubID );
01678 
01679       }
01680 
01681       return;
01682 }

01685 
01686 BOOLEAN DoesVehicleNeedAnyRepairs( INT32 iVehicleId )
01687 {
01688       SOLDIERTYPE       *pVehicleSoldier = NULL;
01689 
01690 
01691       // is the vehicle in fact a valid vehicle
01692       if( VehicleIdIsValid( iVehicleId ) == FALSE )
01693       {
01694             // nope
01695             return( FALSE );
01696       }
01697 
01698       // Skyrider isn't damagable/repairable
01699       if ( iVehicleId == iHelicopterVehicleId )
01700       {
01701             return( FALSE );
01702       }
01703 
01704       // get the vehicle soldiertype
01705       pVehicleSoldier = GetSoldierStructureForVehicle( iVehicleId );
01706 
01707       if ( pVehicleSoldier->bLife != pVehicleSoldier->bLifeMax )
01708       {
01709             return( TRUE );
01710       }
01711 
01712       // everything is in perfect condition
01713       return( FALSE);
01714 }
01715 
01716 
01717 INT8 RepairVehicle( INT32 iVehicleId, INT8 bRepairPtsLeft, BOOLEAN *pfNothingToRepair )
01718 {
01719       SOLDIERTYPE       *pVehicleSoldier = NULL;
01720       INT8                          bRepairPtsUsed = 0;
01721       INT8                          bOldLife;
01722 
01723       // is the vehicle in fact a valid vehicle
01724       if( VehicleIdIsValid( iVehicleId ) == FALSE )
01725       {
01726             // nope
01727             return( bRepairPtsUsed );
01728       }
01729 
01730       // Skyrider isn't damagable/repairable
01731       if ( iVehicleId == iHelicopterVehicleId )
01732       {
01733             return( bRepairPtsUsed );
01734       }
01735 
01736       // get the vehicle soldiertype
01737       pVehicleSoldier = GetSoldierStructureForVehicle( iVehicleId );
01738 
01739       if ( !DoesVehicleNeedAnyRepairs( iVehicleId ) )
01740       {
01741             return( bRepairPtsUsed );
01742       }
01743 
01744       bOldLife = pVehicleSoldier->bLife;
01745 
01746       // Repair
01747       pVehicleSoldier->bLife += ( bRepairPtsLeft / VEHICLE_REPAIR_POINTS_DIVISOR );
01748 
01749       // Check
01750       if ( pVehicleSoldier->bLife > pVehicleSoldier->bLifeMax )
01751       {
01752             pVehicleSoldier->bLife = pVehicleSoldier->bLifeMax;
01753       }
01754 
01755       // Calculate pts used;
01756       bRepairPtsUsed = ( pVehicleSoldier->bLife - bOldLife ) * VEHICLE_REPAIR_POINTS_DIVISOR;
01757 
01758       // ARM: personally, I'd love to know where in Arulco the mechanic gets the PARTS to do this stuff, but hey, it's a game!
01759       (*pfNothingToRepair) = !DoesVehicleNeedAnyRepairs( iVehicleId );
01760 
01761       return( bRepairPtsUsed );
01762 }
01763 
01764 
01765 /*
01766 INT16 GetOrigInternalArmorValueForVehicleInLocation( UINT8 ubID, UINT8 ubLocation )
01767 {
01768       INT16 sArmorValue = 0;
01769 
01770       sArmorValue = sVehicleInternalOrigArmorValues[ pVehicleList[ ubID ].ubVehicleType ][ ubLocation ];
01771 
01772       // return the armor value
01773       return( sArmorValue );
01774 }
01775 */
01776 
01777 SOLDIERTYPE * GetSoldierStructureForVehicle( INT32 iId )
01778 {
01779       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL, *pFoundSoldier = NULL;
01780       INT32 iCounter = 0, iNumberOnTeam = 0;
01781 
01782       // get number of mercs on team
01783       iNumberOnTeam = TOTAL_SOLDIERS; //gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID;
01784 
01785       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iNumberOnTeam; iCounter++ )
01786       {
01787             pSoldier = &Menptr[ iCounter ];
01788 
01789             if ( pSoldier->bActive )
01790             {
01791                   if( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
01792                   {
01793                         if( pSoldier->bVehicleID == iId )
01794                         {
01795                               pFoundSoldier = pSoldier;
01796                               iCounter = iNumberOnTeam;
01797                         }
01798                   }
01799             }
01800       }
01801 
01802       return( pFoundSoldier );
01803 }

01805 
01806 void SetUpArmorForVehicle( UINT8 ubID )
01807 {
01808       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01809 
01810 /*
01811       // set up the internal and external armor for vehicles
01812       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_INTERNAL_HIT_LOCATIONS_IN_VEHICLE; iCounter++ )
01813       {
01814             pVehicleList[ ubID ].sInternalHitLocations[ iCounter ] = sVehicleInternalOrigArmorValues[ pVehicleList[ ubID ].ubVehicleType ][ iCounter ];
01815       }
01816 
01817 
01818       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_EXTERNAL_HIT_LOCATIONS_ON_VEHICLE; iCounter++ )
01819       {
01820             pVehicleList[ ubID ].sExternalArmorLocationsStatus[ iCounter ] = 100;
01821       }
01822       */
01823 
01824       // for armour type, store the index into the armour table itself
01825       pVehicleList[ ubID ].sArmourType = Item[ sVehicleArmourType[ pVehicleList[ ubID ].ubVehicleType ] ].ubClassIndex;
01826 
01827       return;
01828 }
01829 
01830 void AdjustVehicleAPs( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 *pubPoints )
01831 {
01832       UINT8 pubDeducations = 0;
01833       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01834 
01835       (*pubPoints) += 35;
01836 
01837       // check for state of critcals
01838 
01839 
01840       // handle for each engine crit
01841       pubDeducations += pVehicleList[ pSoldier->bVehicleID ].sCriticalHits[ ENGINE_HIT_LOCATION ] * COST_PER_ENGINE_CRIT;
01842 
01843       // handle each tire
01844       for( iCounter = RF_TIRE_HIT_LOCATION; iCounter < LR_TIRE_HIT_LOCATION; iCounter++ )
01845       {
01846             if( pVehicleList[ pSoldier->bVehicleID ].sCriticalHits[ iCounter ] )
01847             {
01848                   pubDeducations += COST_PER_TIRE_HIT;
01849             }
01850       }
01851 
01852       // make sure we don't go too far
01853       if( pubDeducations > (*pubPoints) )
01854       {
01855             pubDeducations = (*pubPoints);
01856       }
01857 
01858       // now deduct pts
01859       (*pubPoints) -= pubDeducations;
01860 }

01863 
01864 BOOLEAN SaveVehicleInformationToSaveGameFile( HWFILE hFile )
01865 {
01866       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten;
01867       PathStPtr   pTempPathPtr;
01868       UINT32            uiNodeCount=0;
01869       UINT8       cnt;
01870       VEHICLETYPE TempVehicle;
01871       UINT8             ubPassengerCnt=0;
01872 
01873       //Save the number of elements
01874       FileWrite( hFile, &ubNumberOfVehicles, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
01875       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT8 ) )
01876       {
01877             return( FALSE );
01878       }
01879 
01880       //loop through all the vehicles and save each one
01881       for( cnt=0; cnt< ubNumberOfVehicles; cnt++ )
01882       {
01883             //save if the vehicle spot is valid
01884             FileWrite( hFile, &pVehicleList[cnt].fValid, sizeof( BOOLEAN ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
01885             if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( BOOLEAN ) )
01886             {
01887                   return( FALSE );
01888             }
01889 
01890             if( pVehicleList[cnt].fValid )
01891             {
01892                   // copy the node into the temp vehicle buffer ( need to do this because we cant save the pointers
01893                   // to the soldier, therefore save the soldier ubProfile
01894                   memcpy( &TempVehicle, &pVehicleList[cnt], sizeof( VEHICLETYPE ) );
01895 
01896                   //loop through the passengers
01897                   for( ubPassengerCnt=0; ubPassengerCnt<10; ubPassengerCnt++)
01898                   {
01899         TempVehicle.pPassengers[ ubPassengerCnt ] = ( SOLDIERTYPE * )NO_PROFILE;
01900 
01901                         //if there is a passenger here
01902                         if( pVehicleList[cnt].pPassengers[ ubPassengerCnt ] )
01903                         {
01904                               //assign the passengers profile to the struct
01905                               // ! The pointer to the passenger is converted to a byte so that the Id of the soldier can be saved.
01906                               // ! This means that the pointer contains a bogus pointer, but a real ID for the soldier.
01907                               // ! When reloading, this bogus pointer is converted to a byte to contain the id of the soldier so
01908                               // ! we can get the REAL pointer to the soldier
01909                               TempVehicle.pPassengers[ ubPassengerCnt ] = ( SOLDIERTYPE * ) pVehicleList[cnt].pPassengers[ ubPassengerCnt ]->ubProfile;
01910                         }
01911                   }
01912 
01913                   //save the vehicle info
01914                   FileWrite( hFile, &TempVehicle, sizeof( VEHICLETYPE ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
01915                   if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( VEHICLETYPE ) )
01916                   {
01917                         return( FALSE );
01918                   }
01919                   //count the number of nodes in the vehicles path
01920                   uiNodeCount=0;
01921                   pTempPathPtr = pVehicleList[cnt].pMercPath;
01922                   while( pTempPathPtr )
01923                   {
01924                         uiNodeCount++;
01925                         pTempPathPtr = pTempPathPtr->pNext;
01926                   }
01927 
01928                   //Save the number of nodes
01929                   FileWrite( hFile, &uiNodeCount, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
01930                   if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
01931                   {
01932                         return( FALSE );
01933                   }
01934 
01935                   //save all the nodes
01936                   pTempPathPtr = pVehicleList[cnt].pMercPath;
01937                   while( pTempPathPtr )
01938                   {
01939                         //Save the node
01940                         FileWrite( hFile, pTempPathPtr, sizeof( PathSt ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
01941                         if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( PathSt ) )
01942                         {
01943                               return( FALSE );
01944                         }
01945                         
01946                         pTempPathPtr = pTempPathPtr->pNext;
01947                   }
01948             }
01949       }
01950 
01951       return( TRUE );
01952 }
01953 
01954 
01955 BOOLEAN LoadVehicleInformationFromSavedGameFile( HWFILE hFile, UINT32 uiSavedGameVersion )
01956 {
01957       UINT32            uiNumBytesRead;
01958       UINT32            uiTotalNodeCount=0;
01959       UINT8             cnt;
01960       UINT32            uiNodeCount=0;
01961       PathSt            *pPath=NULL;
01962       UINT8             ubPassengerCnt=0;
01963       PathSt            *pTempPath;
01964 
01965       //Clear out th vehicle list
01966       ClearOutVehicleList( );
01967 
01968       //Load the number of elements
01969       FileRead( hFile, &ubNumberOfVehicles, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
01970       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT8 ) )
01971       {
01972             return( FALSE );
01973       }
01974 
01975       if( ubNumberOfVehicles != 0 )
01976       {
01977             //allocate memory to hold the vehicle list
01978             pVehicleList = (VEHICLETYPE *)MemAlloc( sizeof( VEHICLETYPE ) * ubNumberOfVehicles );
01979             if( pVehicleList == NULL )
01980                   return( FALSE );
01981             memset( pVehicleList, 0, sizeof( VEHICLETYPE ) * ubNumberOfVehicles );
01982 
01983 
01984             //loop through all the vehicles and load each one
01985             for( cnt=0; cnt< ubNumberOfVehicles; cnt++ )
01986             {
01987                   //Load if the vehicle spot is valid
01988                   FileRead( hFile, &pVehicleList[cnt].fValid, sizeof( BOOLEAN ), &uiNumBytesRead );
01989                   if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( BOOLEAN ) )
01990                   {
01991                         return( FALSE );
01992                   }
01993 
01994                   if( pVehicleList[cnt].fValid )
01995                   {
01996                         //load the vehicle info
01997                         FileRead( hFile, &pVehicleList[cnt], sizeof( VEHICLETYPE ), &uiNumBytesRead );
01998                         if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( VEHICLETYPE ) )
01999                         {
02000                               return( FALSE );
02001                         }
02002 
02003                         //
02004                         // Build the passenger list
02005                         //
02006 
02007                         //loop through all the passengers
02008                         for(ubPassengerCnt=0; ubPassengerCnt<10; ubPassengerCnt++)
02009                         {
02010           if ( uiSavedGameVersion < 86 )
02011           {
02012                                 if( pVehicleList[cnt].pPassengers[ubPassengerCnt] != 0 )
02013                                 {
02014                                       // ! The id of the soldier was saved in the passenger pointer.  The passenger pointer is converted back
02015                                       // ! to a UINT8 so we can get the REAL pointer to the soldier.
02016                                       pVehicleList[cnt].pPassengers[ubPassengerCnt] = FindSoldierByProfileID( (UINT8)pVehicleList[cnt].pPassengers[ ubPassengerCnt ], FALSE );
02017                               }
02018           }
02019           else
02020           {
02021                                 if( pVehicleList[cnt].pPassengers[ubPassengerCnt] != ( SOLDIERTYPE * )NO_PROFILE )
02022                                 {
02023                                       // ! The id of the soldier was saved in the passenger pointer.  The passenger pointer is converted back
02024                                       // ! to a UINT8 so we can get the REAL pointer to the soldier.
02025                                       pVehicleList[cnt].pPassengers[ubPassengerCnt] = FindSoldierByProfileID( (UINT8)pVehicleList[cnt].pPassengers[ ubPassengerCnt ], FALSE );
02026                               }
02027             else
02028             {
02029               pVehicleList[cnt].pPassengers[ubPassengerCnt] = NULL;
02030             }
02031           }
02032                         }
02033 
02034 
02035                         //Load the number of nodes
02036                         FileRead( hFile, &uiTotalNodeCount, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
02037                         if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
02038                         {
02039                               return( FALSE );
02040                         }
02041 
02042                         if( uiTotalNodeCount != 0 )
02043                         {
02044                               pPath = NULL;
02045 
02046                               pVehicleList[cnt].pMercPath = NULL;
02047 
02048                               //loop through each node
02049                               for( uiNodeCount=0; uiNodeCount<uiTotalNodeCount; uiNodeCount++ )
02050                               {
02051                                     //allocate memory to hold the vehicle path
02052                                     pTempPath = (PathSt *)MemAlloc( sizeof( PathSt ) );
02053                                     if( pTempPath == NULL )
02054                                           return( FALSE );
02055                                     memset( pTempPath, 0, sizeof( PathSt ) );
02056 
02057                                     //Load all the nodes
02058                                     FileRead( hFile, pTempPath, sizeof( PathSt ), &uiNumBytesRead );
02059                                     if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( PathSt ) )
02060                                     {
02061                                           return( FALSE );
02062                                     }
02063 
02064 
02065                                     //
02066                                     //Setup the pointer info
02067                                     //
02068 
02069                                     if( pVehicleList[cnt].pMercPath == NULL )
02070                                           pVehicleList[cnt].pMercPath = pTempPath;
02071                                     
02072 
02073                                     //if there is a previous node
02074                                     if( pPath != NULL )
02075                                     {
02076                                           pPath->pNext = pTempPath;
02077 
02078                                           pTempPath->pPrev = pPath;
02079                                     }
02080                                     else
02081                                           pTempPath->pPrev = NULL;
02082 
02083 
02084                                     pTempPath->pNext = NULL;
02085 
02086                                     pPath = pTempPath;
02087                               }
02088                         }
02089                         else
02090                         {
02091                               pVehicleList[cnt].pMercPath = NULL;
02092                         }
02093                   }
02094             }
02095       }
02096       return( TRUE );
02097 }

02106       gMercProfiles[ pVehicleList[ iVehId ].ubProfileID ].sSectorY = ubSectorY;
02107

02110 void UpdateAllVehiclePassengersGridNo( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
02111 {
02112       INT32 iCounter, iId;
02113       SOLDIERTYPE *pPassenger;
02114 
02115       // If not a vehicle, ignore!
02116       if ( !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
02117       {
02118             return;
02119       }
02120 
02121       iId = pSoldier->bVehicleID;
02122 
02123       // Loop through passengers and update each guy's position
02124       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iSeatingCapacities[ pVehicleList[ iId ].ubVehicleType ]; iCounter++ )
02125       {
02126             if( pVehicleList[ iId ].pPassengers[ iCounter ] != NULL )
02127             {
02128                   pPassenger = pVehicleList[ iId ].pPassengers[ iCounter ];
02129                   
02130                   // Set gridno.....
02131                   EVENT_SetSoldierPosition( pPassenger, pSoldier->dXPos, pSoldier->dYPos );
02132             }
02133       }
02134 }

02213 BOOLEAN OKUseVehicle( UINT8 ubProfile )
02214 {
02215       if ( ubProfile == PROF_HUMMER )
02216       {
02217             return( CheckFact( FACT_OK_USE_HUMMER, NO_PROFILE ) );
02218       }
02219       else if ( ubProfile == PROF_ICECREAM )
02220       {
02221             return( CheckFact( FACT_OK_USE_ICECREAM, NO_PROFILE ) );
02222       }
02223       else if ( ubProfile == PROF_HELICOPTER )
02224       {
02225             // don't allow mercs to get inside vehicle if it's grounded (enemy controlled, Skyrider owed money, etc.)
02226             return( CanHelicopterFly() );
02227       }
02228       else
02229       {
02230             return( TRUE );
02231       }
02232 }

02235 
02236 void TeleportVehicleToItsClosestSector( INT32 iVehicleId, UINT8 ubGroupID )
02237 {
02238       GROUP *pGroup = NULL;
02239       UINT32 uiTimeToNextSector;
02240       UINT32 uiTimeToLastSector;
02241       INT16 sPrevX, sPrevY, sNextX, sNextY;
02242 
02243 
02244       pGroup = GetGroup( ubGroupID );
02245       Assert( pGroup );
02246 
02247       Assert( pGroup->uiTraverseTime != -1 );
02248       Assert( ( pGroup->uiTraverseTime > 0 ) && ( pGroup->uiTraverseTime != 0xffffffff ) );
02249 
02250       Assert( pGroup->uiArrivalTime >= GetWorldTotalMin() );
02251       uiTimeToNextSector = pGroup->uiArrivalTime - GetWorldTotalMin();
02252 
02253       Assert( pGroup->uiTraverseTime >= uiTimeToNextSector );
02254       uiTimeToLastSector = pGroup->uiTraverseTime - uiTimeToNextSector;
02255 
02256       if ( uiTimeToNextSector >= uiTimeToLastSector )
02257       {
02258             // go to the last sector
02259             sPrevX = pGroup->ubNextX;
02260             sPrevY = pGroup->ubNextY;
02261 
02262             sNextX = pGroup->ubSectorX;
02263             sNextY = pGroup->ubSectorY;
02264       }
02265       else
02266       {
02267             // go to the next sector
02268             sPrevX = pGroup->ubSectorX;
02269             sPrevY = pGroup->ubSectorY;
02270 
02271             sNextX = pGroup->ubNextX;
02272             sNextY = pGroup->ubNextY;
02273       }
02274 
02275       // make it arrive immediately, not eventually (it's driverless)
02276       SetGroupArrivalTime( pGroup, GetWorldTotalMin() );
02277 
02278       // change where it is and where it's going, then make it arrive there.  Don't check for battle
02279       PlaceGroupInSector( ubGroupID, sPrevX, sPrevY, sNextX, sNextY, 0, FALSE );
02280 }

02283 void AddVehicleFuelToSave( )
02284 {
02285   INT32         iCounter;
02286       SOLDIERTYPE   *pVehicleSoldier = NULL;
02287 
02288       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < ubNumberOfVehicles ; iCounter++ )
02289       {
02290             // might have an empty slot
02291             if( pVehicleList[ iCounter ].fValid )
02292     {
02293           // get the vehicle soldiertype
02294           pVehicleSoldier = GetSoldierStructureForVehicle( iCounter );
02295       
02296           if( pVehicleSoldier )
02297       {
02298         // Init fuel!
02299         pVehicleSoldier->sBreathRed = 10000;
02300         pVehicleSoldier->bBreath    = 100;        
02301       }
02302     }
02303   }
02304 }
