02306 
02307 BOOLEAN CanSoldierDriveVehicle( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT32 iVehicleId, BOOLEAN fIgnoreAsleep )
02308 {
02309       Assert( pSoldier );
02310 
02311       if ( pSoldier->bAssignment != VEHICLE )
02312       {
02313             // not in a vehicle!
02314             return( FALSE );
02315       }
02316 
02317       if ( pSoldier->iVehicleId != iVehicleId )
02318       {
02319             // not in THIS vehicle!
02320             return( FALSE );
02321       }
02322 
02323       if ( iVehicleId == iHelicopterVehicleId )
02324       {
02325             // only Skyrider can pilot the helicopter
02326             return( FALSE );
02327       }
02328 
02329       if( !fIgnoreAsleep && ( pSoldier->fMercAsleep == TRUE ) )
02330       {
02331             // asleep!
02332             return( FALSE );
02333       }
02334 
02335       if( ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) || AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) || AM_AN_EPC( pSoldier ) )
02336       {
02337             // vehicles, robot, and EPCs can't drive!
02338             return (FALSE);
02339       }
02340 
02341       // too wounded to drive
02342       if( pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE )
02343       {
02344             return (FALSE);
02345       }
02346 
02347       // too tired to drive
02348       if( pSoldier->bBreathMax <= BREATHMAX_ABSOLUTE_MINIMUM )
02349       {
02350             return (FALSE);
02351       }
02352 
02353 
02354       // yup, he could drive this vehicle
02355       return( TRUE );
02356 }
02357 
02358 
02359 BOOLEAN SoldierMustDriveVehicle( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT32 iVehicleId, BOOLEAN fTryingToTravel )
02360 {
02361       Assert( pSoldier );
02362 
02363       // error check
02364       if( ( iVehicleId >= ubNumberOfVehicles ) || ( iVehicleId < 0 ) )
02365       {
02366             return ( FALSE );
02367       }
02368 
02369       // if vehicle is not going anywhere, then nobody has to be driving it!
02370       // need the path length check in case we're doing a test while actually in a sector even though we're moving!
02371       if ( !fTryingToTravel && ( !pVehicleList[ iVehicleId ].fBetweenSectors ) && ( GetLengthOfPath( pVehicleList[ iVehicleId ].pMercPath ) == 0 ) )
02372       {
02373             return( FALSE );
02374       }
02375 
02376       // if he CAN drive it (don't care if he is currently asleep)
02377       if ( CanSoldierDriveVehicle( pSoldier, iVehicleId, TRUE ) )
02378       {
02379             // and he's the ONLY one aboard who can do so
02380             if ( OnlyThisSoldierCanDriveVehicle( pSoldier, iVehicleId ) )
02381             {
02382                   return( TRUE );
02383             }
02384             // (if there are multiple possible drivers, than the assumption is that this guy ISN'T driving, so he CAN sleep)
02385       }
02386 
02387       return( FALSE );
02388 }
02389 
02390 
02391 
02392 BOOLEAN OnlyThisSoldierCanDriveVehicle( SOLDIERTYPE *pThisSoldier, INT32 iVehicleId )
02393 {
02394       INT32 iCounter = 0;
02395       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
02396 
02397 
02398       for( iCounter = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID; iCounter <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; iCounter++ )
02399       {
02400             // get the current soldier 
02401             pSoldier = &Menptr[ iCounter ];
02402 
02403             // skip checking THIS soldier, we wanna know about everyone else
02404             if ( pSoldier == pThisSoldier )
02405             {
02406                   continue;
02407             }
02408 
02409             if( pSoldier -> bActive )
02410             {
02411                   // don't count mercs who are asleep here
02412                   if ( CanSoldierDriveVehicle( pSoldier, iVehicleId, FALSE ) )
02413                   {
02414                         // this guy can drive it, too
02415                         return( FALSE );
02416                   }
02417             }
02418       }
02419 
02420       // you're da man!
02421       return( TRUE );
02422 }

02425 
02426 BOOLEAN IsSoldierInThisVehicleSquad( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT8 bSquadNumber )
02427 {
02428       INT32 iVehicleId;
02429       SOLDIERTYPE *pVehicleSoldier;
02430 
02431 
02432       Assert( pSoldier );
02433       Assert( ( bSquadNumber >= 0 ) && ( bSquadNumber < NUMBER_OF_SQUADS ) );
02434 
02435       // not in a vehicle?
02436       if( pSoldier->bAssignment != VEHICLE )
02437       {
02438             return( FALSE );
02439       }
02440 
02441       // get vehicle ID
02442       iVehicleId = pSoldier->iVehicleId;
02443 
02444       // if in helicopter
02445       if ( iVehicleId == iHelicopterVehicleId )
02446       {
02447             // they don't get a squad #
02448             return( FALSE );
02449       }
02450 
02451       pVehicleSoldier = GetSoldierStructureForVehicle( iVehicleId );
02452       Assert( pVehicleSoldier );
02453 
02454       // check squad vehicle is on
02455       if ( pVehicleSoldier->bAssignment != bSquadNumber )
02456       {
02457             return( FALSE );
02458       }
02459 
02460 
02461       // yes, he's in a vehicle assigned to this squad
02462       return( TRUE );
02463 }

02465 
02466 SOLDIERTYPE*  PickRandomPassengerFromVehicle( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
02467 {
02468       UINT8 ubMercsInSector[ 20 ] = { 0 };
02469       UINT8 ubNumMercs = 0;
02470       UINT8 ubChosenMerc;
02471       INT32 iCounter, iId;
02472 
02473       // If not a vehicle, ignore!
02474       if ( !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
02475       {
02476             return( NULL );
02477       }
02478 
02479       iId = pSoldier->bVehicleID;
02480 
02481       // Loop through passengers and update each guy's position
02482       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iSeatingCapacities[ pVehicleList[ iId ].ubVehicleType ]; iCounter++ )
02483       {
02484             if( pVehicleList[ iId ].pPassengers[ iCounter ] != NULL )
02485             {
02486                   ubMercsInSector[ ubNumMercs ] = (UINT8)iCounter;
02487                   ubNumMercs++;
02488             }
02489       }
02490 
02491       if ( ubNumMercs > 0 )
02492       {
02493             ubChosenMerc = (UINT8)Random( ubNumMercs );
02494 
02495             // If we are air raid, AND red exists somewhere...
02496     return( pVehicleList[ iId ].pPassengers[ ubChosenMerc ] );
02497   }
02498 
02499   return( NULL );
02500 }

02502 BOOLEAN DoesVehicleHaveAnyPassengers( INT32 iVehicleID )
02503 {
02504       if( !GetNumberInVehicle( iVehicleID ) )
02505       {
02506             return FALSE;
02507       }
02508       return TRUE;
02509 }
02510 
02511 BOOLEAN DoesVehicleGroupHaveAnyPassengers( GROUP *pGroup )
02512 {
02513       INT32 iVehicleID;
02514 
02515       iVehicleID = GivenMvtGroupIdFindVehicleId( pGroup->ubGroupID );
02516       if( iVehicleID == -1 )
02517       {
02518             #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
02519                   AssertMsg( iVehicleID != -1, "DoesVehicleGroupHaveAnyPassengers() for vehicle group.  Invalid iVehicleID." );
02520             #endif
02521             return FALSE;
02522       }
02523 
02524       return DoesVehicleHaveAnyPassengers( iVehicleID );
02525 }
